text: Somewhere in a quiet town... a little bookstore.
Negative Takemoto: "...!"
Tachibana: "Hey! Isn’t that Negative Takemoto?!"
You: "You know him? He’s seriously good-looking."
Tachibana: "Right? Told you so."
Negative Takemoto: "..."
You: "Huh? Why does it feel so heavy when I get closer? What’s with this dark vibe?!"
Tachibana: "See? He’s negative just like his name."
You: "Wow... even though he’s this handsome…"
Negative Takemoto: "...Nice to meet you."
You: "...Nice to meet you too."
Valley Girl A: "Whoa! Look over there!"
Valley Girl B: "No way! There’s a total hottie… He’s coming this way!"
Valley Girl A: "Um, excuse me—"
Valley Girl B: "Ugh! The air just got so heavy!"
Valley Girls: "..."
Valley Girls: "Sorry, we’ll be going now..."
You: "He didn’t say a word and they already picked up his gloomy aura..."
Tachibana: "How heavy can the atmosphere get…"
You: "Guess I’ll have to show ‘em how it’s done."
Tachibana: "What are you up to now?"
You: "Hey! Ladies!"
You: "Will both of you go out with me?!"
Tachibana: "Greedy much…"
Valley Girl A: "Ew... gross..."
Valley Girl B: "Yeah, not a chance..."
Valley Girl F: "Do you even know what you’re saying right now?!"
Valley Girl W: "Go look in a mirror before you open your mouth, loser!"
Valley Girl W: "I’ll eat you alive!"
You: "Wait—there’s even more of them now?!"
You: "And this one’s legit scary!"
You: "They must be blushing..."
Tachibana: "Not even close."
Negative Takemoto: "..."
Negative Takemoto: "You..."
Negative Takemoto: "You’re not even good-looking like me…"
Negative Takemoto: "So why are you so positive...?"
You: "You picking a fight with me?!"
Negative Takemoto: "No... just honestly curious."
You: "What’s with this guy? He’s not even that negative."
Tachibana: "Right? That’s what I’ve been saying."
Tachibana: "He’s pretty aware of how he looks, so he’s always wondering…"
Tachibana: "Why are there people out there who aren’t as handsome or tall as him, but still manage to be positive?"
Negative Takemoto: "If I were you, I’d honestly end it all right away."
Negative Takemoto: "Like, the moment I was born."
You: "Isn’t he secretly the worst of us all...?"
Tachibana: "That’s the thing. The wildest part is he really means it."
Tachibana: "Back in elementary school, he wrote a book report called, ‘Why do people who aren’t as good-looking as me still stay positive?’"
You: "He’s always been this way..."
You: "And that’s not even a book report!"
Negative Takemoto: "I’m thinking of majoring in this in college."
You: "Majoring in what?!"
You: "That’s not even a real field!"
Tachibana: "See ya!"
You: "What a total weirdo..."
Tachibana: "But he’s actually a good guy. He’s got great taste, too."
You: "Come to think of it, why did you suddenly want to go to a bookstore?"
Tachibana: "No real reason. Bookstores are just fun to wander through, y’know?"
You: "Yeah, true."
Tachibana: "And just like good books, you had some good encounters, right? Like with Shizuku and Takemoto."
Tachibana: "There’s still a ton of my friends and Chibi’s friends you haven’t even met yet."
Tachibana: "I’ll introduce you, so you can have fun too."
You: "Thanks."
Tachibana: "Don’t forget to keep up your abstinence!"
Tachibana: "Alright, let’s go home."
Negative Takemoto’s event will also be featured in Zephyr House.
